Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This sector is geothermally unstable, causing fire and heat to leak through to the surface.
该区域受地热不稳定，火焰和热量会泄出地表。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][production/][/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector suffer [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] resistance.[/bullet][bullet]Every {turns} combat turns:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]All units take {TCdamage} damage with a strength {Burnchance} chance to cause [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal and non-Mineral units for {BurningDuration}[turn/].[/bullet][/bulletList][/bulletList]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred]惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[production/]产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位失去策略地图[hp/][abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位减少 [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred]抵抗。[/bullet][bullet]每 {turns} 个战斗回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]所有单位受到 {TCdamage} 伤害，并且非缥缈单位和非矿物单位有 {Burnchance} 的力量几率受到[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 {BurningDuration}[turn/]。[/bullet][/bulletList][/bulletList]

Annexing a sector means attaching the sector to your colony sector.All units have 'Regeneration' on the world map, which is how much life they get every turn. Ethereal and Mineral are unit types, meaing a ghostlike or rocklike creature, respectively.

Every {turns}[turn/], the battlefield surges with geothermal heat, dealing {Tcdamage} damage to all units, with a strength {Burnchance} chance to cause [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal and non-Mineral units for {BurningDuration}[turn/]
每 {turns}[turn/]战场将涌出地热能量，对所有单位造成 {Tcdamage} 伤害，非缥缈单位和非矿物单位有 {Burnchance} 的力量几率受到[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]，持续{BurningDuration}[turn/]
Ethereal and Mineral are unit types, meaing a ghostlike or rocklike creature, respectively.

This unit is affected by the Geothermal Instability in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received each strategic turn.[br/]Unit suffers [abilityred]{Resistancereduction}[/abilityred] resistance.
该单位受到该区域地热动荡的影响，每个战略回合获得的[hp/]恢复将会无效。[br/]单位减少 [abilityred]{Resistancereduction}[/abilityred]抵抗。
All units have a resistance against damage and status effects.
This sector is under the effect of an Ion Storm, causing Arc bolts to surge through the air.
该区域正受到离子风暴影响，电弧闪电在空中涌现。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][energy/][/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector suffer [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] resistance.[/bullet][bullet]Every {turns} combat turns:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]{TargetNumber} random units take {TCdamage} damage with a strength {Electrifiedchance} chance to apply [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for {ElectrifiedDuration}[turn/][/bullet][/bulletList][/bulletList]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred]惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[energy/]产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位失去策略地图[hp/][abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位减少 [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred]抵抗。[/bullet][bullet]每 {turns} 个战斗回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]{TargetNumber}随机单位受到 {TCdamage} 伤害，并且有 {Electrifiedchance} 力量几率对非缥缈单位施加[abilityred]触电[/abilityred]，持续 {ElectrifiedDuration}[turn/][/bullet][/bulletList][/bulletList]
Happiness is a value in your colonies, that deals with how happy the population in your colony is.

Every {turns}[turn/], {TargetNumber} random units are hit by Arc bolts, dealing {BoltDamage}[damagewave/] with a strength {ElectrifiedStrength} chance to cause [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal units for {ElectrifiedDuration}[turn/]
每 {turns}[turn/]，{TargetNumber} 个随机单位将遭到电弧闪电攻击，受到 {BoltDamage}[damagewave/]且非虚灵单位有 {ElectrifiedStrength} 力量几率受到[abilityred]触电[/abilityred]，持续{ElectrifiedDuration}[turn/]
This unit is affected by the Ion Storm in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn.[br/]Unit suffers [abilityred]{Resistancereduction}[/abilityred] resistance.
该单位受到该区域离子风暴的影响，每个战略回合获得的[hp/]恢复将会无效。[br/]单位减少 [abilityred]{Resistancereduction}[/abilityred]抵抗。
This sector is affected by a Spore Cloud, a Biochemical hazard dangerous to most conventional lifeforms.
该区域正受到孢子云影响，这种生化灾害对大多数传统生物而言都非常危险。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][food/][/bullet][bullet]Non-Xenoplague units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Non-Xenoplague units in this sector suffer [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] resistance.[/bullet][bullet]Every combat turn:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]Non-Xenoplague Biological and Cyborg units have a strength {PoisonStrength} chance to become [abilityred]Poisoned[/abilityred] for {PoisonDuration}[/bullet][/bulletList][/bulletList]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred]惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[food/]产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]该区域内的非异星疫病单位失去策略地图[hp/][abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]该区域内的非异星疫病单位减少 [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred]抵抗。[/bullet][bullet]每个战斗回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]非异星疫病生物单位和半机械人单位有 {PoisonStrength} 的力量几率[abilityred]中毒[/abilityred]，持续{PoisonDuration}[/bullet][/bulletList][/bulletList]
Xenoplague is one of the secret technologies of the game.
Every turn, all non-Xenoplague Biological and Cyborg units have a strength {Poisonchance} chance to become [abilityred]Poisoned[/abilityred] for {PoisonDuration}[turn/]
每回合，所有非异星疫病生物单位和半机械人单位有 {Poisonchance} 的力量几率[abilityred]中毒[/abilityred]，持续{PoisonDuration}[turn/]
This unit is affected by the Spore Cloud in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn.[br/]Unit suffers [abilityred]{Resistancereduction}[/abilityred] resistance.
该单位受到该区域孢子云影响，每个战略回合获得的[hp/]恢复将会无效。[br/]单位减少 [abilityred]{Resistancereduction}[/abilityred]抵抗。
This sector is affected by Nuclear Fallout from a past detonation.
该区域正受到过去爆炸产生的核辐射影响。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][food/][/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector suffer [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] to all damage resistances.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred]惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[food/]产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位失去策略地图[hp/][abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位对所有伤害的抵抗减少 [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred]。[/bullet]
单位对所有伤害的抵抗减少 [abilityred]{ResistanceReduction}[/abilityred]。
This unit is affected by the Nuclear Fallout in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn.[br/]Unit suffers {resistances} to all resistances.
该单位受到该区域核能辐射影响，每个战略回合获得的[hp/]恢复将会无效。[br/]单位的所有抵抗减少 {resistances}。
This sector contains a tear into the Abyss through which its malevolent influence seeps into this world.
该区域中开启了一条通往深渊的裂缝，邪恶正从中涌入这个世界。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][production/][/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Vision and scanning range of Non-Psynumbra units is reduced by {SightRangeReduction}[/bullet][bullet]Non-Mindless and non-Psynumbra units suffer {MoraleDebuff}[/bullet][bullet]Psynumbra Marauders spawn here to raid their surroundings.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred]惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[production/]产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位失去策略地图[hp/][abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]非赛努布拉单位的视野和扫描范围减少 {SightRangeReduction}[/bullet][bullet]非无意识单位和非赛努布拉单位受到 {MoraleDebuff}[/bullet][bullet]此处将生成赛努布拉劫掠者并向四周发动袭击。[/bullet]

Psynumbra is one of the secret technologies of the game. Vision and scanning range deal with how far a unit can see or detect units on the world map, respectively. Mindless units are units without a mind, so simple drones and robots etc. Marauders are units on the world map that cannot be engaged in diplomacy, and attack everything they see in sight.
非无意识单位和非赛努布拉单位减少 {MoraleReduction}
This unit is affected by the Abyssal Tear in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn.
此单位受到该区域深渊裂隙影响，每个战术回合获得的[hp/]恢复将会无效。
This unit is affected by the Abyssal Tear in this sector, causing its vision and scanning range to be reduced by {SightRangeReduction}.
该单位受到该区域深渊裂隙影响，视野和扫描范围减少 {SightRangeReduction}。
This unit is affected by the Abyssal Tear in this sector, suffering from {MoraleDebuff}.
该单位受到该区域深渊裂隙影响，受到 {MoraleDebuff}。
This sector is Dimensionally Unstable, causing the reality in this section of space to blur.
该区域的维度动荡不安，现实空间变得模糊不清。
Dimensionally unstable is in refering to alternate dimensions that are interfering with the current dimension (reality) of the sector.

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][energy/][/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Every combat turn:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]Non-Voidtech units have a strength {Instabilitychance} chance to receive [abilityred]Dimensional Instability[/abilityred][/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred]惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[energy/]产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位失去策略地图[hp/][abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]每个战斗回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]非虚空科技单位有 {Instabilitychance} 的力量几率获得[abilityred]维度动荡[/abilityred][/bullet]
Voidtech is one of the secret technologies of the game. Dimensional Instability is a status effect that
Every turn, non-Voidtech units have a strength {DimensionalInstabilityStrength} chance to receive [abilityred]Dimensional Instability[abilityred/].
每回合，非虚空科技单位有 {DimensionalInstabilityStrength} 的力量几率获得[abilityred]维度动荡[abilityred/]。
This unit is affected by the Void Storm in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn.
该单位受到该区域虚空风暴影响，每个战术回合获得的[hp/]恢复将会无效。
This sector is under the Veil of Tranquility, granting refuge to the faithful and damnation to the accused.
该区域处于静谧帷幕之下，虔诚之人将获得庇护，罪恶之人将受到惩戒。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector grants {Happiness} to the colony.[/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][research/][/bullet][bullet]Non-Mechanical and non-Psynumbra units regain an additional {WorldmapRecoveryBonus} per strategic turn.[/bullet][bullet]Every combat turn:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet][abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] units are healed for {EnlightenedHeal}[/bullet][bullet]Units afflicted with [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] take {SoulblazeDamage} damage.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地获得 {Happiness}。[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地 [research/] 产量 [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]非机械和非赛努布拉单位每个战略回合额外恢复 {WorldmapRecoveryBonus}。[/bullet][bullet]每个战斗回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet][abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]单位治疗 {EnlightenedHeal}[/bullet][bullet]受到[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]影响的单位受到 {SoulblazeDamage} 伤害。[/bullet]
编辑：-->“灵魂烈焰”改为“灵魂燃烧”

Celestian is one of the secret technologies of the game. Enlightened is a celestian status effect that speaks to their soul being enlighted with starlight, washing their soul in truth. Soulburn is a debuff applied to enemy units, that sets their soul on fire, dealing damage and debuffing them.
Every turn, [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] units are healed for {EnlightenedHeal}, and [abilityred]Soulblazed[/abilityred] units take {SoulblazeDamage} damage.
每回合，[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]单位治疗 {EnlightenedHeal}，同时受到[abilityred]灵魂烈焰[/abilityred]影响的单位受到 {SoulblazeDamage} 的伤害。
This unit is affected by the Veil of Tranquility in this sector, receiving an extra {Hpregen} per strategic turn.
该单位受到该区域静谧帷幕影响，每个战略回合额外获得 {Hpregen}。
There is an oil spill contaminating this sector.
该区域被泄露的石油污染。

[bulletList][bullet]Annexing this sector penalizes the colony with [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred][/bullet][bullet]Annexing this sector causes a colony to generate [abilityred]-20%[/abilityred][energy/] and [supply/][/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector lose their Strategic Map [hp/] [abilityred]Regeneration[/abilityred].[/bullet][bullet]Units in this sector suffer [abilityred]{OilResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] [DamageThermal/] resistance.[/bullet][bullet]Every Combat Turn:[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]Non-Flying units have a strength {OilSlowChance}[DamagePhysical/] chance to become [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] for {OilSlowDuration}.[/bullet]

[bulletList][bullet]吞并该区域将使殖民地受到 [abilityred]{Happiness}[/abilityred] 惩罚[/bullet][bullet]吞并该区域将会使殖民地[abilityred] -20% [/abilityred][energy/] 产量和 [supply/] 产量。[/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位失去策略地图 [hp/] [abilityred]再生[/abilityred]。[/bullet][bullet]该区域内的单位减少 [abilityred]{OilResistanceReduction}[/abilityred][DamageThermal/] 抵抗。[/bullet][bullet]每个战斗回合：[/bullet][bulletList][bullet]非飞行单位有 {OilSlowChance}[DamagePhysical/] 力量几率变得[abilityred]缓慢[/abilityred]，持续 {OilSlowDuration}。[/bullet]

This unit is affected by the Oil Spill in this sector, nullifying the [hp/] regeneration received per strategic turn and have [abilityred]{OilResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] [DamageThermal/] resistance.
该单位受到该区域石油泄漏影响，每个战略回合获得的 [hp/] 恢复将会无效，并减少 [abilityred]{OilResistanceReduction}[/abilityred] [DamageThermal/] 抵抗。
Every turn, units have {OilSlowChance} strength chance to become [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] for {OilSlowDuration}.
单位在每个回合有 {OilSlowChance} 力量几率变得[abilityred]缓慢[/abilityred]，持续 {OilSlowDuration}。
